mapper.select: SELECT dg.id, dg.desc, dg.player_num, COUNT(dp.role), dg.estimated_start_date FROM d_game dg LEFT JOIN d_player dp ON dg.status = 1 AND dp.role='player' AND dp.game_id=dg.id GROUP BY dg.id
SELECT du.nickname FROM d_user du, d_player dp WHERE dp.role = "judger" AND dp.user_id = du.id
SELECT count(1) FROM d_player WHERE user_id = #{userId}
